All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Ball
This class is the super class for RubberBall.
This class will be the super class for all ball objects which may be extended in the future.
This class defines the general behaviour of all ball objects.
BallTest  
Brick
The nested class, Crack was extracted from this class of the original code.
This class is the super class for ClayBrick, CementBrick SteelBrick, GoldBrick.
This class will be the super class for all brick objects which may be extended in the future.
This class defines the general behaviour for all brick objects.
CementBrick
This class is brick of type Cement and the only brick type with strength of 2.
This class is the only brick type that draw cracks on impact for this version.
ClayBrick
This class is brick of type Clay with strength of 1.
Crack
This class is extracted from Brick of the original code.
DebugConsole
This class represents the DebugConsole that is shown when user presses 'ALT','F1' and 'SHIFT'.
This class has been modified from the original code along with having additions to become a controller class.
It is the controller class for the model GameBoard and the view DebugPanel.
DebugPanel
This class has been modified from the original code along with having additions to become a view class.
This class is the view class for the controller DebugConsole and for the model GameBoard.
DebugPanelTest  
GameBoard
Both GameView and GameController are extracted from this class of the original code.
This class has been modified from the original code along with having additions to become a model class.
This class is the model class for the view GameView and the controller GameController
GameBoardTest  
GameController
This class is extracted from GameBoard of the original code and has been modified along with having additions.
This class is the controller class for the model GameBoard and the view GameView.
It defines the action on keyboard input during the game play.
It reads and writes to highScoresList.txt.
It sorts the highScoreList.txt contents and writes to sortedHighScoresList.txt
GameView
This class is extracted from GameBoard of the original code and has been modified along with having additions to become a view class for the model GameBoard and the controller GameController
GoldBrick
This class is a newly created class that is not from the original code.
This class is brick of type Gold which is broken with a probability as specified as GoldBrick.GOLD_PROBABILITY
HomeMenu
HomeMenuController is extracted from this class of the original code.
This class has been modified along with having additions to become a view class.
This class is the view class for the controller HomeMenuController.
HomeMenuController
This class is extracted from HomeMenu of the original code and modified along with having additions.
This class is the controller class for HomeMenu.
This class defines the actions to be performed when HomeMenu options are clicked.
It calls the enableGameBoard().
It reads and displays sortedHighScoresList.txt HomeMenuController.readSortedHighScores()
HomeMenuController.displaySortedHighScores().
It calls the enableInfoView().
It terminates the process successfully System.exit(int).
HomeMenuTest  
Impacts
This class is extracted from Wall of the original code.
This class defines the corresponding updates to be performed by the related components when impacts are detected.
InfoController
This class is a newly created class that is not from the original code.
This class is the controller class for InfoView Defines the action to be performed on key pressed when InfoView is in display.
InfoView
This class is a newly created class that is not from the original code.
This class represents the view for when the "INFO" button of the HomeMenu is clicked.
Levels
This class is extracted from Wall of the original code and has been modified along with having additions.
This class defines all the possible levels of the game.
LevelsTest  
Main
This class was the GraphicsMain class of the original code and renamed to Main to provide easier understanding of the current code.
The class that contains the main method that calls the initialise() using the EventQueue.invokeLater(Runnable).
Player
This class defines the player.
PlayerTest  
RubberBall
This class is a ball of type Rubber.
This class is the current type of ball used for all levels.
ScoreSorting
This class is a newly created class that is not from the original code.
This class is used for score sorting functionality on sorting the highScoresList.txt
SteelBrick
This class is brick of type Steel which is broken with a probability specified as SteelBrick.STEEL_PROBABILITY.
User
This class is a newly created class that is not from the original code.
This class is to temporarily store user information in Arraylists before writing to highScoresList.txt
ViewManager
This class has been modified from the original code along with having additions to become a view class.
This class was the GameFrame class of the original code and is renamed to provide easier understanding of the current code.
This class contains methods to enable different views.
Wall
Levels, Impacts is extracted from this class, whereas anything else unrelated to a wall of bricks is moved into GameBoard.
This class is the wall of bricks in all levels.
WallTest
